N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 304.3 - Approval

State Regulations

The chief administrative officer of each college is
authorized to approve the employment of a retired person in the professional
service at such college, and shall report such approval of employment to the
chancellor. The chancellor may require submission by a college of applications
for such re-employment for his approval when he deems it in the best interest
of the State University. The chancellor or designee is authorized to approve
employment of a retired person in the professional service by system
administration, and to approve employment of a retired person as a chief
administrative officer. Approval for the employment of retired persons shall be
granted only when such approval would be in accordance with the several
provisions and limitations of the act. Notes
